name: Exeption Rules
description: Rules that makes more noise than help

rules.justification: The record {0} should be modified before saving to the database.
The Tooltip property for {0} {1} must be filled.
App.json 'target' property must not be set to 'Internal' or 'OnPrem'.
The compilation target is set to '{0}', but it must be set to 'Cloud' or 'Extension'.
The FlowField yy of table should be added to the SIFT key.
The AppSourceCop configuration must specify one of the following properties: 'mandatorySuffix', 'mandatoryPrefix', or 'mandatoryAffixes'
